en: to go away, to leave, (euph.) to pass away
to fill in, to fill out
to learn, to master, to acquire
to summarize, to compile, to bring together
to look at, to examine, to view
to be located, to be situated
to send, to send over (to someone)
to mark, to note, to celebrate
to go (by vehicle), to drive, to ride
to lift, to raise; to build
to visit, to be a guest
to taste; to taste good to someone; to be tasty
to prepare oneself, to get ready
to gain, to obtain; to sustain (an injury)
to obtain, to acquire, to get
to fly in, to arrive (by plane)
to turn on, to switch on
to interest; to concern; to be relevant to
to do, to carry out, to accomplish
to manufacture, to produce, to make
to go out, to exit; to pass (an exam)
to have fun, to entertain oneself
to look, to appear, to seem
to turn off, to switch off; to exclude
to feel, to sense, to perceive
to climb, to go up; to get on (transport)
to cover; to set (the table); to spread (on)
to paint, to color, to dye
to run (of transport on a route)
